DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study is to monitor the usage of INLYTA® in real practice, including the adverse events associated with INLYTA®.
DOC.brief_title: Post Marketing Surveillance Study to Observe Safety and Efficacy of Inlyta in South Korea
DOC.detailed_description: Investigators can choose any patient who is within the scope of I/E criteria
DOC.criteria: Patients diagnosed as advanced RCC after failure of one prior systemic therapy. Any patient who does not agree that Pfizer or companies working on behalf of Pfizer can use his/her information. Patients with hypersensitivity to axitinib or to any other component of INLYTA® . Patients under 18. Pregnant women.
